News.headline: Loan Update: 14th February 2017
News.short_description: Update on Daggers Loan players Hyde, Heard, Shepherd, Barnwell and Berkowicz
News.description:
Midfielder Tyrique Hyde made his first start playing the full 90 minutes for Whitehawk FC last night, after joining them on a one month loan, in a 0-0 away draw with Wealdstone FC in the Vanarama National League South.

The game also saw defender Jimmy Shepherd come off the bench for Whitehawk in the 70th minute, while striker Joe White played the full 90 minutes for Wealdstone FC for the second time in two days after also starting for the side in their 1-1 home draw with Oxford City on Saturday. 

Striker Shomari Barnwell played the full 90 minutes for Bishop’s Stortford on Saturday in a 2-0 away loss to Hungerford Town on Saturday, with the forward striking the post with a fourth minute penalty. 

Midfielder Scott Heard played his first game on loan at East Thurrock United on Saturday as they lost 2-0 away to Welling United on Saturday. 

Lastly striker Jakub Berkowicz started for Barkingside on Saturday in a 2-2 draw at home to Burnham Ramblers FC in the Essex Senior League.
